text.text: Welcome to my {b}FIRST RELEASE{/b}! . . . sort of, Uhh I have multiple projects in the works. I'll have updates on these online bulletins, which are found in any of my projects.

My patreon as of now is still under review(*fingers crossed its done soon), this month I'm planning to posting the files for the basic version of the online bulletin board on patreon for {b}I Want It All{/b} tier patrons, a more complex version (the one I'm using) of it will be released on itch.io.
